channel.title: Proof that this forum isnt being moderated
channel.description:

item.title: Proof that this forum isnt being moderated
item.dc:creator: @leader leader
item.description:
@leader wrote:

[quote=“The Un-Named, post:9, topic:8565”][quote author=jimsmi6 link=topic=12151.msg136339#msg136339 date=1155050710]
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,11971.0.html

If anyone was still alive that thread would be locked. Kthxbye.
[/quote]

The same guy also posted this:

How is that a helpful post? Dose it contribute to the thread?

Go get a life. kthxbye. :mad:[/quote]

Good point.

item.title: Proof that this forum isnt being moderated
item.dc:creator: @kmb Kmb
item.description:
@kmb wrote:

[quote=“jimsmi6, post:1, topic:8565”]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,11971.0.html

If anyone was still alive that thread would be locked. Kthxbye. :)[/quote]
Are you fucking retarded? The staff do the best they can. No one reads every single post on this forum. It’s summer vacation (for most of the mods/admins here) and we just may have something else to do than scan through every single post for spam. And when we delete the pointless spam, pricks start complaining about it.

Go get a life. kthxbye. :mad:

Read full topic

item.title: Proof that this forum isnt being moderated
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Have you looked at the rs2 tutorial section lately? Atleast 40 topics with [req] in the beginning.

And the mods/admins havnt done anything about it. Its a damn tutorial section and there not enforcing it. I asked a noob on msn the other day why does he post it in that section and not in the help section. His reply was simply: “i can’t be bothered to.”

You, on the other hand, can’t be bothered making a list of the offending threads and PMing it to an admin, instead you make a thread in GD and bitch about it. Cry me a river, build me a bridge, and get over it. The mods do the best they can.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

They do the best they can. Unlike you, who does the most attention-seeking you can.

Proof that this forum isn’t being moderated by assholes is that annoying noobs like you haven’t been removed yet. The more you bitch about how little they do, the more likely they are to ban spamming scum such as yourself.
